introduce.title: #INTRODUCE
introduce.headerComment: I am a developer with 6 years of experience, continuously growing based on various development experiences.

commentList.0: Experience in backend development allows a quick understanding of the overall structure of the product.
commentList.1: I have various improvement experiences in frontend, including test automation and rendering speed optimization.
commentList.2: I pursue a culture of shared growth and run junior developer study groups in the company.
commentList.3: I document my outputs from side projects and studies on my blog.
commentList.4: I constantly think about good UX and always consider the user perspective during development.

techStack.title: #TECH STACK
techStack.info:
3: Immediately applicable to work 
2: Usable based on experience 
1: Some experience

0.title: User Approval System Development
0.intro: Developed a system that provides approval for server and DBMS account permissions and commands, responsible for both frontend and backend development. Focused on improving the frontend environment and UX.

myWork.0: Improved resource usage and speed with Webpack-bundle-analyzer
myWork.1: Expanded product sales range by applying multilingual support
myWork.2: Managed frontend development environment by updating NodeJS version, introducing storybook, etc.
myWork.3: Improved bug rate by introducing Cypress
myWork.4: Enhanced UX by applying SSE for real-time progress monitoring

1.title: Real-time Facial Recognition Management System Development
1.intro: Developed a system using facial information for user authentication, responsible for both frontend and backend development. Focused on improving API and designing UI that clearly conveys real-time data.

myWork.0: Expanded browser support through cross-browser compatibility
myWork.2: Improved API query speed for facial recognition management system by applying Redis
myWork.3: Reduced CPU usage by 40% through API improvements
myWork.4: Enhanced code readability by file splitting and component separation

2.title: In-house Product License System Development
2.intro: Developed a system for managing customer companies using in-house OTP, responsible for both frontend and backend development. Completed development in a week based on NodeJS due to tight schedule.

myWork.0: Set up frontend/backend technology environment and implemented basic functions
myWork.2: Developed infinite scroll component for large data handling

3.title: OTP Mobile App Development
3.intro: Solely responsible for the architecture design, development, and deployment of an in-house OTP generation mobile app for authentication systems.

myWork.0: Designed and developed mobile UI based on Google Material Design
myWork.1: Experienced iOS and Android app review and deployment process

4.title: In-house Sales Management System Improvement
4.intro: Responsible for frontend and backend development of an in-house sales management system used for product orders, customer management, etc. Focused on resolving existing issues such as slow query speeds and improving frontend technology environment.

myWork.2: Optimized query performance to enhance sales management query speed

0.title: Electronic Tax Invoice System Maintenance
0.intro: Developed and maintained a system for issuing and viewing tax invoices on the web, handling both frontend and backend development. In addition to basic maintenance, developed various new features according to business requirements.

myWork.1: Added invoice issuance notification feature via message

1.title: Electronic Tax Invoice System UI Improvement
1.intro: First task as an intern, improved the UI from Flex to JSP due to the end of Flash support in IE browser.

myWork.1: Improved UI for user information management and tax invoice inquiry
myWork.2: Conducted browser compatibility testing and response

0.title: react-scroll-header-loading
0.desc: This is a top loading bar component based on Javascript scroll event. It recorded over 300 downloads in just two weeks after release.

1.title: Participation in Jocode AI Hackathon with Google - My Vitamin AI Solution Service
1.desc: Provides vitamin recommendations and combinations through the Gemini API. Solely responsible for frontend development, set up technical environment, and implemented Skeleton loading within 4 days.

2.title: resume-template
2.desc: Implemented a resume web template based on NextJS and Typescript.

3.title: AI Employment Consulting
3.desc: Provides company recommendations by processing various information such as user's coding skills and projects with AI. Responsible for overall frontend development, currently in progress.

0.name: Inha University
0.desc: I am a class of 2021 student in the Department of Software Convergence Engineering, expected to graduate in February 2025.

1.name: Mirim Girls' Information Science High School
1.desc: I entered the New Media Solution Department in 2014 and graduated in 2016. I immediately started my career as a web developer after graduation.
